thread.title: Le Pen refuses to wear headscarf, nixes meeting with top Lebanese cleric
thread.title_full: Le Pen refuses to wear headscarf, nixes meeting with top Lebanese cleric

author: REUTERS
title: Le Pen refuses to wear headscarf, nixes meeting with top Lebanese cleric
text:
Le Pen refuses to wear headscarf, nixes meeting with top Lebanese cleric By REUTERS February 21, 2017 11:18 "You can pass on my respects to the Grand Mufti, but I will not cover myself up," says French far-right presidential contender. French far-right's Le Pen refuses to wear headscarf to meet Lebanon's Grand Mufti 
BEIRUT - Marine Le Pen, presidential candidate for France's far-right National Front party, canceled a meeting on Tuesday with Lebanon's Grand Mufti after refusing to wear a headscarf for the encounter."You can pass on my respects to the Grand Mufti, but I will not cover myself up," Le Pen told reporters.
